name: TinyTanks
description:
Top-down multiplayer game in Lowpoly.

Up to 4 players control their tanks to achieve the best score.

You can share your IP address and play with other friends.

- local multiplayer (with your local IP, check via command line "ipconfig")

- public IP

Download Game

Latest release: alpha 0.1.1 (changelog, roadmap, source code)
